comment: CATY_14 Monte Carlo Valuation - 10K Simulation Runs

simulation_summary.rating_rationale: Median -9.2% and mean -7.1% vs spot flag downside skew, but delta remains within HOLD guardrails pending Q3 10-Q evidence.
simulation_summary.skew_note: Mean remains above median but both trail the share price; loss probability now 61%.
simulation_summary.key_findings_html:
1. Median outcome: $42.62 (-9.2% vs spot) => valuation skew now negative.
  2. Downside tail: $24.60 5th percentile aligns with severe CRE migration.
  3. Upside tail: Requires ROTE >14% and NCO <20 bps (probability 17%).
  4. Loss probability: 60.9% of simulations end below $46.94.

probability_bands.interpretation: Downside tail dominated by CRE impairments
Credit normalization with limited rate relief
Bull case relies on NIM expansion

scenario_breakdown.description: Fed cuts (−50/−25/0 bps blend) with benign credit migration.
Through-cycle mean NCO (43 bps) and modest rate relief.
Movie theatre/retail watchlist migration with flat/+25 bps rates.
GFC analogue: CRE downgrades widen losses, limited rate relief.

probability_of_loss.interpretation: Downside probability exceeds upside after credit recalibration

var_analysis.var_interpretation: 5th percentile outcome implies >$21 downside per share
var_analysis.cvar_interpretation: Average of worst 5% implies shares near $22.5

narratives.key_findings_html:
1. Median outcome: $42.62 (-9.2% vs spot) => valuation skew now negative.
  2. Downside tail: $24.60 5th percentile aligns with severe CRE migration.
  3. Upside tail: Requires ROTE >14% and NCO <20 bps (probability 17%).
  4. Loss probability: 60.9% of simulations end below $46.94.
narratives.rating_implication_html: Rating Implication: Negative skew warrants caution, but with spot now -6.1% above intrinsic value we maintain a HOLD pending fresh evidence.
narratives.distribution_rationale_html:
• ROTE: Truncated normal anchored to 2024–2025 volatility.
  • NCO: Log-normal with fat right tail to capture CRE impairments.
  • COE & g: Normal draws with tighter variance reflecting market anchoring.
narratives.var_analysis_html:
6.1 VaR (95% Confidence)

VaR95: $21.47 drop (-45.7%)

6.2 Conditional Value-at-Risk

CVaR95: Avg loss $23.53; implied price $22.54 (-50.1%).
narratives.qa_intro_html: Simulation rerun with updated covariance; QA checks confirm probability integrity.
narratives.python_code_html: See scripts/analysis/run_monte_carlo_caty.py for configuration and reproducibility log.
narratives.distribution_interpretation_html:
• ROTE: Truncated normal anchored to 2024–2025 volatility.
  • NCO: Log-normal with fat right tail to capture CRE impairments.
  • COE & g: Normal draws with tighter variance reflecting market anchoring.
narratives.sensitivity_highlight_html: Sensitivity rerun pending refreshed Monte Carlo drivers.
narratives.methodology_interpretation_html: Methodology comparison narrative will refresh after next Monte Carlo rerun.
